function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Prolonged existence of the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Negative social, political, and economic impacts","Mitigation":"Effective health measures and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Health surveillance systems, contact tracing apps","People":"Global population, especially in developing economies","Owner":"Governments, global health organizations"},{"Description":"Second/third wave of the pandemic in cities","Impact":"Increased spread of the virus, higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Enforcement of strict public health measures, vaccination drives","Technologies":"Health surveillance systems, contact tracing apps","People":"Residents of affected cities","Owner":"Local governments, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Historical reference to the Spanish Flu pandemic","Impact":"Recognition of the importance of green urban spaces for disease mitigation","Mitigation":"Urban greening, city beautification, creation of urban parklands","Technologies":"Green infrastructure, landscaping technology","People":"Urban residents","Owner":"City and urban planning authorities"}]}
